metadata.title: CVE-2014-0021 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Chrony before 1.29.1 has traffic amplification in cmdmon protocol

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chrony - 3.2-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chrony package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2-4ubuntu1').
